      • damageItem

        public static void damageItem(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemToDamage,
                              boolean armor)
        Damages an item for exactly 1 point. Sends a warning message if the item broke or is about to break.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who owns the item.
        itemToDamage - The item to be damaged.
        armor - If the item is armor.

      • damageItem

        public static void damageItem(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemToDamage,
                              int damage,
                              boolean armor)
        Damages an item for a given number of points. Sends a warning message if the item broke or is about to break.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who owns the item.
        itemToDamage - The item to be damaged.
        damage - The damage, that should be done to the item.
        armor - If the item is armor.
